localResource.label: Storage_type
localResource.queryString: SELECT enum_translator_view_2_3.value, enum_translator_view_2_3.enum_key, sort = 0 FROM enum_translator_view_2_3, storage_domain_configuration_view_2_3, datacenter_storage_domain_map_view_2_3 WHERE storage_domain_configuration_view_2_3.storage_domain_type = enum_translator_view_2_3.enum_key AND enum_translator_view_2_3.enum_type = 'STORAGE_DOMAIN_TYPE' AND datacenter_storage_domain_map_view_2_3.storage_id = storage_domain_configuration_view_2_3.storage_domain_id AND datacenter_storage_domain_map_view_2_3.datacenter_id = $P{P_DataCenter_ID} UNION SELECT 'All', -1, 1 FROM enum_translator_view_2_3 ORDER BY sort DESC
